titleStmt.title: The wise and faithful steward. Or, A narration of the exemplary death of Mr. Beniamin Rhodes steward to the right honourable Thomas Earl of Elgin, &c. Briefly touch'd in a funeral sermon, and since enlarged. Together with some remarkable passages concerning Mrs Anne Rhodes his wife, who dying few houres after him, was buried together in the same grave with him in Malden Church in Bedfordshire, Aug. 4. 1657.
titleStmt.author: Samways, Peter, 1615-1693.
